title: HW1 Q6
content: Problem Context:More review for you of basic ML and optimization ideas, although some of you may not have seen this exactly in your previous ML or optimzation course. However, it also provides you with a good opportunity to review the mathematical manipulations needed to understand this.

Problem Context:

More review for you of basic ML and optimization ideas, although some of you may not have seen this exactly in your previous ML or optimzation course. However, it also provides you with a good opportunity to review the mathematical manipulations needed to understand this.
